name: baghdad
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Iraq, in the central part of the country: The television presenter will travel to Baghdad to interview some of the country's leading musicians. He rose to become the director of the company's Baghdad office, but lost his job in 1990.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Baghdad the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Baghdad.The conference met in Baghdad to elect a transitional parliament.Three medical staff have joined a six-strong surgical team in Baghdad.
